entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:13 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
